Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers

Provides helper classes that can be used by applications

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCUIAuthenticationHelper
    SCUIAuthenticationHelper class is the class that authenticates the user given in the SCUIContext through the SCUIAuthenticationProvider.
    SCUIAuthorizationHelper
    SCUIAuthorizationHelper is the class that checks for permission for the user given in the SCUIContext through the SCUIAuthorizationProvider.
    SCUIDataTypeHelper
    This is a helper class for data type handling.
    SCUIExtensionsPathHelper  
    SCUIHomePageHelper
    Utility class which instantiates and manages home page providers which have been plugged-in.
    SCUIJSLibraryHelper
    This is the helper class for any JS library.
    SCUILocalizationHelper
    This is a helper class for localization.
    SCUILocalSessionHelper
    SCUILocalSessionHelper class maintains the SCUILocalSession for each SessionId This SCUILocalSession will not be replicated like the HttpSession.
    SCUIMashupHelper
    This is the controller class for any mashup execution.
    SCUIPresentationDataConversionHelper
    Utility helper class which handles conversion of data into a format which is required by the presentation layer.
    SCUIScreenIdentifiersHelper  
    SCUISecureCookieHelper
    SCUISecureCookieHelper class is the class that checks for the cookie in the secure Https connection given in the SCUIContext through the ISCUISecureCookieProvider.
    SCUISecureTokenGeneratorHelper
    This is helper class to generate secure tokens.
    SCUIStateHelper
    Helper class which can be invoked by applications to easily save/retrieve state information.
    SCUITransactionContextHelper
    SCUITransactionContextHelper class is the class that initializes SCUITransactionContextFactory and gets TransactionContext using this factory.
    SCUIXAPIMashupSecurityHelper  

Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.helpers Description

Provides helper classes that can be used by applications
